Genevieve Austin

  3. Foster Family: Fred Englehardt

  10. Gender: female

Source: National Orphan Train Complex; "Riders of the Orphan Trains: Nebraska," http://www.usgennet.org/usa/ne/topic/trains/riders.htm; Mary Ellen Johnson, comp., Orphan Train Riders: Their Own Stories vol. 6 (Baltimore: Gateway Press, 1992), p. 219-221; Aurora News Register, 3 January 1980; Clay County News, 31 January 1980.
